item.title: Text Analysis of NHL Hockey Coach Interviews
item.description: Code for this analysis is availabile on Github In the 2016 NHL playoffs, the Eastern Conference champion Pittsburgh Penguins, coached by Mike Sullivan, defeated the Western Conference champion San Jose Sharks, coached by Peter DeBoer, in a best of seven series to win the fourth Stanley Cup in their franchiseâ€™s history.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Code for this analysis is availabile on Github I plan on using this space to post my musings on statistics that, shall we say, fall outside of the hallowed halls of academia.
